transcript: how did I find people I asked and I was willing to have people say no real real very few people said no to me my whole journey and I think it was because the way that I asked was I didn't ask I went and said hey this is all the stuff I'm good at and I would just prepare stuff and I would do work ahead of time to help them with their business and I would just get on a call and be like here's all the value I could possibly deliver to you if it was anybody worth anything because winners give back they were like dude I was not expecting this dude what can I do for you I'd be like okay I really have this question do you know how to do this thing and they're like no but I know a guy and I'll put you guys together
